website_summaries.verdict: Using one of the stronger magnets, this mount works with nearly all smartphones and adheres to your car for added safety and improved navigation.
pros: Noted for its strong adhesive hold, which customers note may take rubbing alcohol to remove
Fits even better with some DIY work and your CD player
A truely hands-free option, this mount is ideal for transportation professionals
cons: While we love the adhesive qualities, the actual tightening mechanism could be stronger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best magnet phone mount I've ever had. I put the magnet between my phone and the case (did NOT use the adhesive, as the magnet stays in place just fine) and now I'm able to see the navigation app on my phone perfectly. The back of the part that goes in the car is small enough to fit almost anywhere. That's where I always had a problem in the past. The magnets are super strong too. While the phone is on it, I can try to move it up, down and sideways and it WILL NOT MOVE. The only way the phone comes off is to pull the phone straight UP. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Julie V

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet and adhesive.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, if you have awkward vents, or they would not be in a great spot, especially for the drivers - these stick on ones are the perfect alternative. Plus you don't have to worry about the magnet coming with your phone when you remove it to leave your vehicle, which tends to happen with the vent ones. Strong magnets, which is great. The vent ones are handy if you plan on renting a car as it is easy to pack with your chargers and then you have the GPS mount with you in the rental car. Not as optimal but it is better than getting lost and paying extra for the GPS package the rental company would charge.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grip
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly for me so far...I put one in each car. The hard part is mainly finding a spot where you can mount it, given how busy dashboards are these days, and curvy too. But I found a good spot in my Toyota Camry and Subaru Outback. And it's nice that the phone attachment portion is thin and not-in-the-way. I had been using one of the vent based holders which, rather than the magnet, grabbed the sides of the phone. But it was always hard to position it so it didn't hit the on/off or volume switches of my phone. This works a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: NRS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how we ever lived without this! Georgia has the new hands free law, so we needed a way to talk on the phone or use navigation without actually holding the phone in our hands or on our laps. I also cannot stand vent or dash mounts because of the angle and how far away they are. This is different, You can mount this anywhere, I have mine right by the steering wheel at just the right angle and distance from me. I can voice call on speaker phone or Bluetooth without ever touching the phone. It’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great holder!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, they have a very strong magnet that can not only handle my Note 8 but my daughter's Nintendo switch as well. Would purchase again without a second thought!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Islas

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive sucks. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s just too hot or if the sticky adhesive just sucks, but the sticky stuff falls off the plastic tab of the magnet nonstop and then my phone falls down while I’m driving. Not safe.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but doesn’t stick to certain surfaces. Wish the attachment was also a bit longer so that although I have to attach to a certain part of my dash (not many options for my old car) it doesn’t obstruct view of clock or control of radio. See 2007 Rav4. iPhone6S Plus Works perfectly, though& i love not having to open a mount, insert phone, adjust accordingly before heading out in my car... Now i just get in my car, put my phone on the mount and i’m off.. pretty much just set it & forget it, so i loooove it. Just -1 star as i see room for some design improvement
customer_reviews.author: Sheva

customer_reviews.title: Great product: Read my Technical Review
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the metal plate working when placed inside a phone case. I have a fairly thin phone case and didn't want anything stuck to the outside of it. The magnetic base is good quality and has enough flexibility to contour to the autos dash. The locking nut works well. Even through the phone case the magnet holds securely even when in bumpy terrain. Not to mention the price was right. Great product and a great value
customer_reviews.author: Brian Barsamian

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't stick to it's own adhesive
customer_reviews.text: This product is just useless. The adhesive stuck to my dashboard by came off of the product itself. I could understand differences in dashboard textures of materials, but for the product itself to fall off of the adhesive just shows they didn't even test the quality of the product. I bought a two pack and the same happened to each unit, so it's not a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick to dashboard
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple different of the adhesives they sent with it and none of them worked. I think they were old, the wipes they sent with them to clean the dash board first were dried out and the adhesive wasn't very sticky. I was planning on returning them, but my son lost one of the magnets. We just bought a new vehicle and left our old one in vehicle that we traded in and was planning on purchasing the same kind of magnetic phone holder and they were sold out, so I tried these ones and sadly was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: Update 4-22-19. Broke after 9 months. The phone I use this for is a Galaxy S7. Got this for my work phone to mount to the dash in my truck and it holds well. At first I used the metal plate under my phone cover but it would not hold so I put one on the outside of the phone cover and it holds very good. Even on rough roads.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: AAA+++ product, universal for all makes/model
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my 2015 Acura RDX. The mounting plate can be easily bent to match the shape of mounting surface for better Adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Birdpetite

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT STICK
customer_reviews.text: im disappointed with this product. I bought it in hopes that it would provide a clear, unobstructed view of my phone (Google Maps is really helpful). But I was so let down when I tried to stick it on my dash it wouldnt hold... at all. It would fall immediately and I tried applying pressure but it just wouldnt stick. Dont know why it didnt stick but I dont want to glue it on either just try it at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: Dog_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how long this was sitting on a shelf for but the alcohol pads where completely dried out and double sided tape didn’t stick. After I cleaned the surface with my own alcohol pads I let it dry and proceeded to follow the directions I peeled the backing off and stuck it to a flat surface on the car and applied pressure for a minute. Directions said to let it dry for an hour. Well an hour later I went outside and it was on the floor of the car. The double sided tape could not hold up the magnet let alone an iPhone. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY OR TIME. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Solid build and strong magnets!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best magnetic phone/device holders/. The air vent ones are just not stable enough. I love how solid these feel. I also love how it comes with a few of those clear adhesive pads that one can put on their dashboard and know that it will safe to remove. Very cool. If your car has a CD player in it, I highly recommend the one that fits in the CD player and a wing nut is opening the jaw inside the CD slot - thus creating a really tight fit,. I use the magnetic one on my desks and at work.. Great magnets for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marc L.

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea but very disappointed in the construction and the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased at first but I started having a problem with the magnetic part swiveling and the phone tilting to one side or the other. I tightened up the ring by hand and it seemed OK for a couple of days then it started to move again. This time when I attempted to tighten it it broke. It is now totally unusable. I’m very disappointed in the construction and quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bissel

customer_reviews.title: Used it to mount X-10 MS16A motion sensor
customer_reviews.text: The MS16A motion sensor is flat mounted so I used the magnetic universal mount unit so I could direct the motion detector to a specific location a little below and to the side of the flat wall. I had to use double sided tape to attach the medal disk to the motion detector and a wood screw to mount the unit to the wall but so far all is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Does not maintain stability.
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice product at first, getting it to adhere to the dash (even after cleaning and drying) unless it is a completely flat space, which is often hard to find in newer vehicles. The biggest concern for me was that within a few months, the adjustable neck no longer sustains the weight of a phone. As soon as I put my phone on it and position it, it immediately drifts out of position and falls to the bottom-most position, rendering it useless as I already had to install it in an inconvenient place in order to get it to adhere to the dash initially. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay after I switched to a lighter phone case. (Iphone 6S Plus) When the Otterbox was on it it fell off the magnet every time I hit a bump. Once I bought a one piece case it worked okay and was very convenient to have the phone just to the right of the steering wheel. Last week the swivel head magnet came off when I pulled the phone off the dash. The plastic around the ball broke and it just fell apart. We bought a two pack and my wife says her phone slides down and rotates in her jeep when it hits bumps, but she is still using it. Also IPhone 6S plus in a case.
customer_reviews.author: TAA

customer_reviews.title: Must have for commuters or road warriors
customer_reviews.text: I poured over cell phone mount solutions for weeks before finally giving this product a chance. It is PERFECT. I drive an older vehicle and needed to have my phone in a place where I could view it since it is my primary navigation unit. The adhesive has held up for about a month now under daily use. I’m very happy with the hold the magnet provides for my iPhone 7. It doesn’t seem like it would have trouble holding larger phone models, but I don’t have a plus so I can’t say for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for large phones
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE! The company contacted me and said to stick a second metal disc on the outside of my case. The mount now holds my phone very firm. First off the adhesive backing that came attached to the mount was no good. Thankfully it came with a backup. My biggest complaint is that the magnet is not quite strong enough to home my iPhone XS Max. It slowly slips down and falls off the mount. I’m going to add some rubber to the back of the case to maybe grip better. It holds my wife’s iPhone 8 just fine. If you have a big phone maybe look at something else. Otherwise a decent mount.
customer_reviews.author: Josh T.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 4 months. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE* After only about 4 months of use, the ring inside behind the magnet plates of the suction broke (appears to be disintegrated may be due to sunlight) Do not buy, unless you get multiple parts extra or a lifetimes guarantee for free replacements. Also, if you have a slightly thick case, it doesn't holding the phone securely! Only had on for 1 day. Works good, suction HAD to be directly in the middle of the magnetic backing especially you have a heavy phone. Came with extra 3M adhesives but the 'wipes' were dried out to clean the area to be used. Would update as it goes but seems to be good build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bsingh24

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: Works as it states, magnets are pretty strong. I have a S10+ and stupidly put the metal plate at the bottom end of the phone. The result was the phone being a little top heavy so it would rotate and flop over, however it NEVER came off the mount. I drove a 1,600 mile trip going over all types of roads including service roads and camping areas that were basically off road quality. Never had it come down, had it flop over a lot, but that was because I did not put the metal piece in the middle so the weight was distributed correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in my Tahoe. The spot (really ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work in my Tahoe. The spot (really the only spot) does not work. When I put the truck into gear the shifter hits the phone, since it sticks out much further than my current mount. Also I found that the small metal disc that I put in between the case and the phone stopped the wireless charging feature. I could probably have played with it a bit to move it around to have the charger work, but since it did not work in my vehicle it became a non-issue
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Works good! Really holds with strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Works good! Really holds with strong magnets. Don’t use the cleaning wipes it comes with, as mine were dried out. Just use a moist glass lenses cleaner pad. Or rubbing alcohol to clean the area you want to stick it first. Make sure it was s dry before sticking it on. Also must be a flat smooth service and Not curved so the mounting plate is perfectly flat with the surface. Apply strong pressure for 30 secs. Then let it sit for 30 mins. To dry Before using it. Mine works perfect and I have an iPhone 8 has never fallen off with an Otter box case on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: F49ers16

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have product
customer_reviews.text: I have seen lots of similar products, I have tried various solution. I love this phone holder. After I put it in my car, my sons wanted one for their cars, then my wife wanted one. I made sure to put them on a flat area of the dashboard, I have not had any problems with it coming loose. The manufacturer provides a slightly thicker mount tape in case the original is not sticky enough. Looks nice when not in use, not obtrusive. Amazing when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Beach boy 33

customer_reviews.title: Broken ball joint clip. Weakest point of whole design.
customer_reviews.text: The ball joint rotation is the biggest issue. When you want to adjust the angle, you have to loosen the dial. And when you get it facing the right angle, you tighten the dial to keep that position. But, mine would not hold it that position for long. So, you repeat the process. And after a few times, the magnetic pad plastic clips broke. So, now it’s useless because the brittle clips that hold on to the magnet and attaches to the ball joint broke.
customer_reviews.author: F. Xavier

customer_reviews.title: The least bulky way to hold your phone near eye level
customer_reviews.text: I've been with this item. My phone pops on and off it easily, and stays put while driving. I love that it is so small; not some bulky contraption on my dashboard or windshield. It may be a little tricky to find a good spot on crowded dashboards--I put mine on the front of the dash, near the top, but not on the top. Also, there are plenty of sticky pads and magnets enclosed: you can cover two cars and 4 devices.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stiltner

customer_reviews.title: 5+ Star excellent holder
customer_reviews.text: Best phone holder that I've seen and there are three top reasons for that. These are very inexpensive compared to other magnetic holders. Adhesive patches stay where you put them and don't cause any damage if you ever do remove them. There's no bulky metallic button you have to secure permanently to the back of your phone. And the magnets are strong and I've never had a phone fall off. I'm returning customer for these because I've bought them for my girlfriend, brother and sister-in-law and other people who love them also.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Check your car before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this product, is that "surprisingly" there are few spots on the dashboard you could place it. In my three cars, I really struggled to find a spot where the phone would not block other controls or be out of reach. But that's not an issue of the product. Just look at your own dashboard before buying. Vent mounts may be easier to accommodate.
customer_reviews.author: matthias b jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but limited viewing angle
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice unit, but for me it has one fatal flaw: my dash is pretty slanted in the only locations with room to mount it, and the swivel doesn’t have enough range of motion for me to tilt my phone so the phone is facing me directly. It’s hard to see the screen easily, the Face ID doesn’t work without removing the phone from the mount and orienting it toward my face, and sometimes there’s a glare off the screen because of the angle. I didn’t have these problems with the magnetic mount I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Longtime computer professional

customer_reviews.title: Great hold. Versatile. Need to put one in bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my car, on the wall to charge phone and on my nighstand. No more dropped phones. Love it. Next one going above the sink so phone wont slide into the bowl again.
customer_reviews.author: love amazon

customer_reviews.title: Secure and reliable holder
customer_reviews.text: Finally, my air vents are free again. I was able to find a spot with this smaller base on my dash where I couldn't make others work. It's sturdy and easy to place. I found the right angle to place my phone in the right place without blocking the car display, too. The attachment is strong. I was able to put the magnet plate in between the two layers of my phone case, leaving my phone alone. No slippage while taking crazy corners or quick stops.
customer_reviews.author: mjjunie

customer_reviews.title: Product didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with this product. I attached the magnetic bar to the back of my phone case and have placed the magnet on my dashboard in between the air vents. When I went to put my phone on the magnet it would not stay up, and kept sliding down making it uncomfortable for me to use when driving. Even though the company said they can’t refund me beyond the 30 days, they did say they would replace it for another product but I already purchased another one from somewhere else. It didn’t work for me so that’s why I gave it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyngirl

customer_reviews.title: It’s just for good looks!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband’s older truck for hands free law. Unfortunately it’s unusable because the adhesive in the back of this thing is as strong as clear scotch tape therefore I can not mount it on his dashboard. It won’t stick to anything. The magnet itself is very strong, it holds iPhone X Max in otter box, but that’s all useless if you can not put it in your vehicle. Maybe I was just unlucky and received defective product but none of the adhesive pads were sticky enough to stay on the dashboard.
customer_reviews.author: Marketa

customer_reviews.title: Great mounting solution
customer_reviews.text: This has been in use now for several months and I’ve been continually impressed with how well it works. Even when going over rough roadways it holds on very well. I’ve been using mine with my iPhone 7S plus, and have the second one to my girlfriend who uses it with a large Samsung phone. Both of us are happy with the ease of use. The fact that it’s a 2-pack makes it rave better. Important: you have to have a flat, or nearly flat space on your dash for this to work. Make sure to clean the surface with isopropyl alcohol, or similar, to ensure good adhesion for the mount.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive came off and threads broke
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive came off during the summer and I had to replace it once in each car. Now during the winter both of the holders broke at the threads while driving to work for me and when my wife put her phone on it in the morning. Im guessing the plastic was weakened other from the heat and the cold made it too brittle or something. Its very disappointing. You should maybe spend a little more because these don’t seem to last long unless you want to buy a new set every year at least once. Summer heat ~ 90-95 Winter cold ~ 50-55
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Good mount, awful magnet adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I love the mount it comes with for sticking it to my truck dash. But the terrible adhesive for the magnet for the cell phone wore off in 2 weeks. Now I have this giant gooey sticky circle leftover on my phone case. I had to use goo gone to remove it. I tried to reapply another one, since the package came with a few magnets. Luckily they did, because they wear off in a weeks time. If it wasn’t for the awful magnet glue it would be 5 star. I love the mount and the magnets are strong enough to hold two trucks together. Why wouldn’t you just use a 3M adhesive on the magnets!!?
customer_reviews.author: Milt Drucker

customer_reviews.title: Phone secured while driving!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount, very strong tape and adjustable magnet head. I wish there was more range of motion on the swivel ball to point the phone downward more when it's mounted on the radio deck-side.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Prongs on back break
customer_reviews.text: We’ve bought 6 total for our cars and 4 have had the prongs break. We are not over tightening and haven’t touched it when our phone falls off. Currently working with WizGear to see how they are willing to work with us. Update: No response from Wizgear. They didn’t respond or refund my money. I wouldn’t recommend this product bc it has proven a defective design. We’ve had 4 out of 6 break. The prongs that mount on the ball are fragile and break too easily. I will be looking for another product to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Best dash mount.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a pretty heavy duty 4 prong suction for years but two drawbacks made me change: 1) when really hot it would fall off my windshield. Not often but enough. 2) it took two hands to grab and take my phone to release the 4 prongs. I already have a case with a magnet built, but it's nice that I get a couple case magnets with this, so getting a magnetic base is just so much easier. This works as advertised, good adhesion, easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M. Tindall

customer_reviews.title: Should be 5 Stars, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are a great value. However, both broke and I had to get warranty replacement, which was very easy and convenient with Amazon. :-) I feel if they used a better quality plastic (or even made a metal upgrade version), or made it thicker around the threaded area around the ball, it would be able to last longer. I have 2 smart phones, so the 2 pack is also very convenient. Like I said, my rating could have been a "5 Star" if it were not for the breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive Does not Not Stick
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product, if only the adhesive can stick to walls. I bought this to stick a Webcam on the wall in order that the entire family can do a group chat, while seated at a distance. The webcam itself has a poor clip. So, I bough this to mount the webcam on the wall. I stuck the circular magnetic plate on the wall, while the swivel mount was affixed at the back of the webcam. Thrice, the circular plate on the wall fell off , together with the swivel mount and the webcam. Third time, the plastic socket of the swivel mount broke completely. Broken on the very first day !
customer_reviews.author: TruthSword

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The base mount magnet comes in 2 pieces. One piece adheres to the surface the other piece is threaded to the mount with a ball insert. The plastic threads are not enough to keep it stable. When placing the phone on the mount is slowly tilts down. I would have to keep tightening the threaded connection. In a months time this piece worn out and broke. Not a good design, and cheap plastic. Using a Galaxy Note 9 which is a bigger and heavier phone, but it shouldn't be too big to make that much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: tattoo

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: First dont even bother using the 3m tape. I had to reapply with gorrilla glue mounting tape to get it to stick. There arm doesnt telescope 360 degrees and is impossible to mount in the dash. The magnet did hold well but the arm juat falls limp, leaving your phone facing the floor. Returning. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay O

customer_reviews.title: Secure adhesion to hard surface.
customer_reviews.text: product adheres very well when applied to a clean dry hard metal or plastic surface. I mounted in a mostly horizontal position on my dash and it holds my I-phone secure. Mounting in that position puts a lot of stress on the glued surface but have had no problem. This is the second set I have installed in two vehicles. I do not have a case and those with a case may have an issued due to the total weight of the phone and case.
customer_reviews.author: DBPSWLA

customer_reviews.title: WizGear Cell phone Mount 'cheap'
customer_reviews.text: Simply stated, this product is junk, cheap plastic, hard to tighten, always fails to stay tight, manufactured with the flimsey-est of plastic, fails to stick (at the base) with the included 3M pad (which was the WORST part of this I certainly would not have expected) and failed in less than two weeks entirely when it shattered as I tried to tighten it. I sternly do not recommend this - in any capacity at all!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Takes more space than I realized to mount.
customer_reviews.text: Out of our three Vehicles it only fit well in one, our Toyota Highlander. ( Ford 250, Subaru Forrester didn't have space for it) There needs to be enough space for your phone to mount without obstructing a vent, dashboard radio, or GPS, etc. Also it holds well for road bumps, etc., but I've knocked it off reaching across it before, because the magnet, though good, it's still pretty easy to lift it off accidently.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette K

customer_reviews.title: very strong magnet.... but
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars but for one small flaw.. the alcohol wipe that is essential for sticking the unit to the dash were completely dry, they need to be moist. Old stock? Both packets in the box were the same. I had to go buy a bottle of rubbing alcohol to properly clean the dash so the unit would stick properly. It would also love to see the ball shaft slightly longer to give more swivel dexterity. 1/2 - 3/4" more would make it almost perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Strong Hold
customer_reviews.text: This was my first phone mount purchase, so I did a lot of shopping around for one that seemed to be one of the best. I am happy to say this mount has worked out very well. The case on my phone was a little too thick, so instead of putting the metal plate on the inside, I attached it on the outside on the back of the case and it's working perfectly fine. The grip is very strong and wouldn't rotate the phone or fall down even down a bumpy road, yet it is easy to remove once you're done. Very convenient mount, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Underhills

customer_reviews.title: Poor adhesion - wish it stayed on dashboard 😢
customer_reviews.text: This was HIGHLY recommend to me and I was so excited to receive however- it must have sat somewhere for a VERY long time- the alcohol wipes were bone dry- the protective Backing strip lining was almost impossible to remove and we took our time and did everything as instructed. The actual magnet is perfect- the idea is excellent and if I could just get it to stick to the dash I would easily give it a high rating.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Liz

customer_reviews.title: First set worked fine, second set broke after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: First set worked fine, second set broke after a month of use. I bought one set maybe 2 years ago, it's been working fine since I got it but it's also in a car I barely drive. I bought another set for my daily car and they didnt last more than a month before the magnet plate broke off the ball. cheap plastics in the second set i got maybe? They both broke exactly the same. The first set in my other car has yet to break.
customer_reviews.author: wallee

customer_reviews.title: Magnet is strong and works well, but adhesive isn't great
customer_reviews.text: These will work fine for me, but the only place I could get good adhesion was on the windshield. Not my favorite place to have my phone. I tried mounting them to the dash and it wouldn't stick at all. That being said, my dash is textured and I didn't have a large enough area with smooth finish to try, so maybe they'll work for you. Comes with many different plates to put between your case and your phone, and once it's on the magnet it sticks well, even with a thicker case.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and strong magnets!
customer_reviews.text: This mount uses a magnet for the base and a thin metal plate (four included with package) attaches to your phone inside the protective case. I was pleasantly surprised how strong the magnet holds the phone. The phone power cord clips into the mount unit also, which helps manage cords. Even on rough Michigan roads it holds! I used this on a trip to Florida and back and it was great! Bonus was getting two units, one for my truck and one for the wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: Duane W

customer_reviews.title: Threads to tighten mount failed.  Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.text: The magnet held my phone (in case) just fine, even when I didn't line it up quite right. I haven't had any issues with adhesion, even on an imperfect dash surface. The only issue I had was that the nut that you tighten down to hold your phone in place stripped out way too easily. I've only had this mount in my truck, which I rarely drive, for two months, and the mechanism failed me. I'm surprised and disappointed, and I'll probably replace it with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kubic

customer_reviews.title: Works great with an Otterbox case
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my parents to help them stay safer while driving since their vehicles don't have bluetooth. They were both hesitant about using one and being able to hear while they talk, after using them for a few weeks now they are both very happy with them. Both of their phones have otterbox cases on them and they still hold them on good without falling off even in the summer heat. Definitely suggest purchasing them!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Helton

customer_reviews.title: Hunk of junk
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for I guess. Don't waste your money. The wipe pad was dried out. An indication it sat on a shelf for a good while. The second one wasn't even in the package. The adhesive didn't even hold the devise up. Never even got as far as seeing about the phone. Yes, I followed instructions and waited.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to use and WAAAAY better than any other clamp-on cell phone car mount
customer_reviews.text: My buddy had this product and when I saw it, I had to have one. I gave the product 5 stars on all accounts. However, be careful how you install the metal plates in your cell phone case. They have an adhesive side, but it is wise to not use the adhesive until you know exactly how to position the plate inside your cell phone case as the plate is small and depending on how you position the mount, the phone may not stay upright. Position the plate more towards the middle of the phone so the phone doesn't want to rotate around the mount. Once it's mounted correctly, there is no better mount on the market.
customer_reviews.author: seameares

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet, not good swivel
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this only lasted a little more than a year. The adhesion to the dash was great and the magnet was strong enough to hold the phone (Pixel 4XL) but not too strong. However, the swivel didn't have a great range of motion and would loosen over time. Over the past few days it felt like it kept getting loose so I kept tightening it and then today as I was tightening, the magnet piece busted off of the mount, so now it's useless. If this was a few years old I'd understand but we just got it in May of last year and didn't actually install it until probably June, so I feel like it should've lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kadester

customer_reviews.title: Holding power to hold a dashcam
customer_reviews.text: I reversed the intended design of these magnetic mounts and rather than stick them on the dash of my vehicles, I stuck the flat plate on the vehicle dash and the magnet on my dashcam. Now when I remove the dashcam the flat plate is almost invisible unless you are looking for it. Yet I can slap the magnetic mount dashcam into place is a second. The adjustment on the mount extension stays put when tightened and gives just enough elevation for the dashcam to see over the parked windshield wipers on my GM truck.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best phone holder, very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal phone holder. If the back of your phone and case is flat and you have a flat surface to mount the holder on your dash, this is an excellent and easy to use holder. If your phone back is slightly curved you may have to use a little glue (think E6000) or form the metal plate to fit your phone. Same with the mount on your dash. That said, you won't find a better mount...
customer_reviews.author: Shepherds

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the product. I just put it in my car today. The magnet works fine but pulling the top sticker off the base so you can stick it to the car is a pain. I wasted two because it wouldn’t peel off I wouldn’t buy this again. ***UPDATE *** I was sent Replacement and it is working fabulously. It must have just been a bad batch. No problems with the replacement. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the Panavise 767-GR2 ball mount, too
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking these magnetic mounts for positioning my cellphone in the car. I use these on a Panavise vehicle-specific mount with the Panavise 767-GR2 ball mount. This magnetic mount holds my Moto G5 and Samsung S9 well. I put the metal plate inside the TPU case I have on the phone. I can also remove this magnetic mount and use the 767-GR2 with a Garmin GPS unit, too, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Karl N.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago to use in my car and I totally love it...so I bought it again to put it in other places where I put my phone. In the car, my phone has never fallen off of it...that's how good the magnet is! And the adhesion of the mount to the dash hasn't failed yet. I now have one in the kitchen & next to my bed. I was constantly knocking it off of the bedside table & now I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Que

customer_reviews.title: Fell off Dashboard after less than two months
customer_reviews.text: I was easy to use and install but it fell off my dashboard less than two months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Amaral

customer_reviews.title: I love this mount!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mount! I got the two pack, one for my work car and one for my truck and I am highly pleased! They stick with no issue I've had mine for about a month neither has loosend up a bit! Holds my iPhone 6s with otterbox with no issues and my galaxy 9 note with silicon Samsung case with no issues! Phone does not vibrate around when driving either! Very sturdy for driving on and off road.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve read the reviews before buying...
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing 2 (4 devices total), after a month or so of use the adhesive peels off. The magnet works fine, but it’s peeled off and bent so much I can’t even re-adhere it. Waste of money. My boyfriend has the VAVA brand, and its held up his phone for 6+ months in his work truck (and he has the IPhone 11 Pro Max) without any issues. Will be purchasing after writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: BreD

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great until cracked
customer_reviews.text: Used daily in my car to hold my iphone. The magnet strong without issued. The swivel screw that tightens the ball to restrict movement, cracked. It became brittle possible over the heat. But the rest of the mount and adhesive is still working. Just to know that this is my second one I bought. First one broke the same way. And it was never abused or overtighened. Will look for other as I like the magnet an swivel concept.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael F.

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesive! But, the plastic eventually broke and now I'm sad.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mount for 6 months. The adhesive part still works great and feels secure! Woo! But, I did have the tabs on the back of the magnetic mount break (the tabs that "hug" the ball joint and are made tight by the screwy-nut thing). I don't know if they broke due to the extreme heat in my location or for another reason — I don't *think* I tightened it too tightly. Thankfully, there are two in the box! I just hope this one doesn't break in 6 months. :(
customer_reviews.author: MoJo

customer_reviews.title: They work great if you have the dashboard space
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I have purchased these before and they work excellent. Sometimes I have had the arm break off but you can easily replace the unit and it last at least a year or more with no issues. I had to return these two because there was no real estate left on my Nissan Altima on the dashboard to attach them. If you have a inch and a half by three-quarter inch space on your dashboard that is flat these will work fine. These new dashboards are all curved.
customer_reviews.author: Hooziz

customer_reviews.title: One stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 3 months, then one of them gave out by constantly spinning the phone and not being still. The other one that came in the package still works. So I guess it's a 2.5/5 stars, but seeing as how little it actually lasted, it's a 2/5. Do not recommend this product to anyone, find something else that works. One thing I will add that is not a con since I understand why it doesn't work, but wireless charging does not work when you have the plate on the back of your phone
customer_reviews.author: Agustin

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Teen Drivers
customer_reviews.text: I received this for Xmas last year and love it. Phone stays on my dash on left side so I can see Waze without being distracted. Picked up another one for my son who just received his license. He likes it too, and it gives me some peace of mind that he is not calling his phone while driving. It holds the phone well. I’d recommend the Speck magnetic cases to go with this, although magnetic plates are included with product
customer_reviews.author: Armi

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty great for car use. They stick well to the dashboard. The magnetic plates work well inside my phone case, and it is so great to just slap my phone up there with one hand and not think around with it. I also like it because it's clean looking, simple, and small. No crazy armatures or dials, or screws or clips. However, it does not rotate screen 360 degrees. It's got a weirdly limited range of motion in One Direction.
customer_reviews.author: BeckT

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you you have a vertical mounting surface.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have a vertical or near vertical surface for it to mount on for it to function as designed. It will not work well for a horizontal mounting surface. It should stick well to a flat or slightly curved surface. Magnet is strong enough to hold a 6 inches Nexus 6 with a sturdy case without a drop. I love one hand mounting and dismounting. Well made item.
customer_reviews.author: Knight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cars with limited dashboard space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for vehicles that don't have options for base placement. In particular I have a Gen 3 Prius and this worked out perfectly. Even though it slightly covers the button as seen in pic, I can still get to them and use them as normal. I had to trim a slight amount of the base to place here to contour the dash but it is working out fine even in +90 degree weather. Excellent adhesion and the magnet is strong. I have a 11 Pro with a silicone case and the metal pad is inside the case too. Phone doesn't even vibrate on rough streets
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Best magnetic hands free I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bummed when I searched for the hands free unit I had bought in the past and could not find it. I settled on this unit. I am so glad I filled it! The magnet is better and stronger in the protective rubber peace makes things better all the way around. I trimmed off a little piece of the melting surface where there is a factory blind to make it fit perfectly on my dash. It has been there for two months and is solid as a rock. **update** It’s June 30th (6 months after purchase) and the plastic mount broke. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P.

customer_reviews.title: SCAM ALERT!
customer_reviews.text: These are complete garbage. First one broke in 10 days and the second one in 2 weeks. The second one literally broke apart when i hit a bump in the road Company is not responding to my messages Save yourself the headache and purchase a quality product from a reputable company, this trashy company doesn't even respond to messages. Hope they go out of business soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good holders, strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Good amounts overall and the magnets are strong enough for the really large IPhones, just make sure to clean the area that you will put this in very well with alcohol wipes first. Also, where are you put these need to be flat. The only problem I had with these so far is that the phone doesn’t stay in position. The angle of the mounts will move over a short time depending on your commute. Also, when you place the metal mounting plates on the back of you phone, you won’t be able to use a wireless charger anymore.
customer_reviews.author: D Harlow

customer_reviews.title: More than a cell phone magnet
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a different application, I mean not as a cell phone holder. But it worked perfect! It swivels almost 360 degrees and the wire clip is an awesome addition to its features. I gave 4 star on its adhesion as this will differ on what surface you will adhere. This is, actually, should not be part of feedback as to the product itself. This goes out to those who gave low feedback because of the tape. Stick it on a smooth even surface and it will be just fine. And besides, seller added extra double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: Froy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I have one in my car, one on my vanity and one on my desk. I don’t know what I’d do without this. This is my 2nd set because the one in my car broke (my fault). When I use my phone for the GPS, This allows me to glance at the map while keeping my eyes on the road as well. No more fumbling for my phone while trying to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost a year - Broken
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mount! If you do not change your phone from horizontal to vertical, this mount will be perfect. If you often adjust your phone from portrait to landscape view then over time the screw that holds the phone to the ball will loosen causing you to frequently have to tighten it, both of the screw casing that holds onto the ball has broken. If these were made a little stronger this would be perfect, I wish they had one made out of metal that could not break. I might try again and wrap it in a couple of layers of electrical tape to give it some strength.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best phone holder out there!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I have the one that attaches to the vent, but I just bought a jeep and it it didn't work on those vents. This works perfect on the dash. It sticks so well and the magnets are super tough my iPhone XR stays in place even over potholes. Best product on the market. This is the 4th time I have purchased the wiz gear products. I have bought them for my family and now both cars. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vido

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, BROKE IN LESS THAN A MONTH, Wizgear won't replace
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product broke before a month. I live in Florida and it seems it cant handle 80 degree weather. This was my 4th unit that I bought and the plastic in which they are made of brakes too quick. BE AWARE, DO NOT BUY! I contacted Wizgear and they kept saying they couldn't find the order, to send them pictures of the broken units and invoices. It took about 2 weeks for them to tell me they won't acknowledge the "1 year warranty" because its sold by Amazon. Dont waste your money, find another company that stands behind their product because WizGear WONT.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Holds my phone securely
customer_reviews.text: Have had this same mount in my car for a few years. My phone has never moved at all including 4 trips from NY to Florida. 3M mount is still holding strong. Just bought 2 more of the same for use in the camper.
customer_reviews.author: hockey-dad

customer_reviews.title: 2 UTVs and a Tractor
customer_reviews.text: Nice product Seems to hold well to dashboard. I installed this on 2 UTVs and a Tractor and my iPhone has not fallen off yet. But make sure it is completely on the disk plate. "Included" lined up correctly. My wife's phone did slip off a couple times, but since mine hasn't I figure she didn't have it lined up "Plate to Magnet" correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Adams

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered another version of this item, the chrome man with a top hat and could not get it to work to save my life. I bought these afterwards and wow am I impressed. Sticks good and holds either of my phones very well. Only improvement I could offer is a little more flexibility on the swivel so you can swing the magnet a little more right to left. As is though, 5 starts especially when you consider the price and that you get 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great product but disappointed with it long term
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The stick on adheres to dash without problems even with surface is slightly rounded it works. I did not adhere phone magnet to phone or cover. I just slipped magnet behind phone cover and it works perfectly. I like the fact that this type holder is low profile and easy to use. Just lay phone on holder and it’s stuck. UPDATE: Plastic tightening dial broke within six months rendering product unusable. Lowering my rating to 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: L. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I bought 1 package (2 in each package) and they mounted easily and the magnet held the phone firmly in place when driving. I put the metal plate inside my phone cover and the magnet magnet was strong enough to keep the phone in place. I liked them so much I bought two more. The mount also has a clip to keep charging cord at hand. Great buy at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Brown

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you think about where to mount...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my truck and my wife's van. I have an F150 with lots of spots where I could mount this, out of the way of my vents and controls/screens. Our van is a Town & Country, and has many curved edges which creates a challenge for getting a good surface for mounting. Not a product problem, just a little short sighted on my end.
customer_reviews.author: WisconsinEh

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have installed it in one of our cars. More specifically the Ford Fusion 2012 and it fits horizontally rather than vertically. It looks very nice and sticks very well. I will update this review with time. Side note, I kinda wish it was smaller so I can install it on the other car but the part that sticks is very large for the Jeep Grand Cherokee 2011 dash for instance.
customer_reviews.author: Sayed Na

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic fail!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for a few months now and honestly it gets on my nerves... The magnetic power is not strong enough and literally every time I hit a small bump my phone comes flying off of the mount onto the ground and I have to fish around for it in the floorboard. I have one in each of my vehicles and I have the same problem in both!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not great...
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard WizGear mount in one truck and figured I'd try the pivot style in the other truck. Nothing about this is great - mount doesn't stick, pivot won't lock in place, and the phone is continuously sliding/falling down. And it's just a standard iPhone X, not the plus. I'll go back to the standard mount next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tape sucks - replace with 3m VHB.  magnet great.
customer_reviews.text: as is - 2 stars. with VHB - 6 stars. I have been running similar magnetic mounts for the cars for several years with great success. I have never had a double sided tape type. This one fell off several times. Yes I did clean it correctly. The trick is to replace the tape that comes on it with 3M VHB tape.
customer_reviews.author: factionfx

customer_reviews.title: Good product with poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived just as described. Ordered as a second magnetic mount for the passenger side of my car. Unfortunately, the quality of this mount doesn’t stack up beside the mount already installed. One mount refused to stick to any surface in the car, and the other, while properly adhered, seems to loosen itself rather quickly when a phone is placed onto the magnet (instead of remaining stable, the phone ends up flopping around mid drive). My advice, pay the extra money to get a more reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a stick on phone mount that can work on a slightly curved surface. The adhesion seems to be great, although I take my phone on and off very carefully. The magnetic mount is very strong, yet the magnet can attach right on the outside of my phone case. And it came with two so I have another for my husband's car.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnets
customer_reviews.text: My phone shakes and turns/rotates, sometimes ends up upside down. This was not the case with my previous phone holder. Luckily I kept the old magnets and it was an easy swap. The metal plate under the rubber cover is held by a small screw, which broke btw when being removed. So - to make it stronger, replace the 4 small round magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I did purchase this item. It works great for my phone, as I have a Pixel. The only issue is where the magnet needs to stick is where the battery is for wireless charging. But I was able to work around it, and it is not this specific products problem, as I have tried other products that do the same thing with a worse result. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Suction power is great just use a better mounting tape.
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is great! Adhesive is not good at all. I have to reinforce and/or change it with good mounting tapes. It doesn't lock good. It still moves and I keep putting it back in place. Do I want to use wrench to fully lock it? Maybe? Maybe not? It could break and I no longer have the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Safer driving and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these. It makes driving so much safer because you can mount the phone within your line of vision of the road, especially when depending on map apps to guide you are you drive, and/or changing the music as you drive. Now when we drive other people's cars we realize how unsafe we were before we bought these mounts. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the idea for this and the couple weeks it did work it was amazing! Kept my phone away from the air vents so it didn’t block the AC but kept my phone mounted for easy reading of my GPS while driving. After a couple weeks the sticky tape didn’t work anymore and couldn’t support the weight of my older model iPhone (so it’s not massively heavy) and would continually fall onto the floor while I drove. Super unsafe!
customer_reviews.author: HarleyTrainer23

product_meta.title: WizGear Magnetic Phone Car Mount, Universal Stick On (2 Pack) Dashboard Magnetic Car Mount Holder, for Cell Phones and Mini Tablets with Fast Swift-snap Technology, Magnetic Cell Phone Mount
product_meta.description:
WizGear Universal Stick On Magnetic Phone Mount Holder Black, 2 Pack 

Setting up your phone on a mount in your car has never been easier! WizGear Air Vent Car Mount for Smartphones saves you the hassle of placing your smartphone securely to make sure it doesn't fall, just stick it on your car dashboard! The WizGear Air Vent Mount features a magnetic technology, which means your smartphone will be secure and have no chance of falling. When a phone is secure in place, it becomes easier to use for GPS navigation too.


Features
1) This magnetic car mount for cell phones is not bulky or space consuming at all. You no longer have to suffice for keeping your phone in the cup holder or dashboard, because a normal car mount gets in the way. This magnetic car mount sticks on a dashboard, thereby not blocking your windshield or Air Vent. 

2) Navigation is extremely easy with this magnetic car mount. It can easily rotate, fix, or tilt to any angle that best assists the viewer of the phone. 

3)The magnetic technology is safe to use, and will not harm any smartphone. The carbon steel plates inside the magnetic car mount are ultra thin and designed in a way that it provides powerful holding power as well as absorbing magnetic instability. Along with being safe, it is also powerful, it attracts any phone to it quickly – this is the swift snap feature. The user can just bring the phone near the mount and it will take it easy, so the user no longer has to fuss about safe keeping their phone 


Instructions how to set up the Mount
1)First clean up the surface on the mounting place. 
2)Peel off the sticker from the mount and stick it on. 
3)Place the magnet metal plate in your case between the cover and the phone, Or stick on the round magnet metal on your phone or GPS 
3) And your phone is good to go!
feature_bullets: COMPLEMENTARY WIZGEAR DESIGN: The complementary design of the magnetic mount is one that fits into the back of any smartphone. The magnetic mount is has a smooth surface that is perfectly suitable for mounting and holding any smartphone in place. magnetic car mount holder

POWERFUL MAGNETIC MOUNTS: The reinforced magnetic holder of this mount is what sets it apart from other mounts. This Universal magnetic holder produces an intensive force of attraction that will hold any smartphone. Including Android, Apple, Blackberry and Microsoft devices.

SWIVELS YOUR DISPLAY: Rotate your smartphone and swivel your display as you please. The base of the mount remains stick on you dashboard of your car and does not move, no matter how much swiveling or rotation you do. This guarantees that your smartphone will always remain in your preferred position.

WIZGEAR STURDY BASE: The high quality rubber construction of the base of the mount is unique and very functional as well. It guarantees that the base of the mount will solidly hold the magnetic head of the mount, to help keep your smartphone in place, regardless of road vibrations or impacts
WILL NOT BLOCK THE AIR VENTS: and the windshield of the car. Its 10 times easier to use than any other mounts just stick it on your car and you are good to go.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars8,226 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
